

# Data

The SAGES data comes from the `SAGES-Subject-Interview-Data-Analysis-File.dta` file. It uses the GCP score from all waves.

```{r}
sagesI_df %>%
  select(vdgcp2023_rta) %>%
  gtsummary::tbl_summary(
    statistic = list(
      gtsummary::all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})",
      gtsummary::all_categorical() ~ "{n} / {N} ({p}%)"
    )
  )
```

The Duke data comes fromt the file `MADCOPC_INTUIT_DukeCCI.xlsx` file. It uses the CCI score from both time points.

```{r}
intuit_df %>%
  select(Duke_CCI) %>%
  gtsummary::tbl_summary(
    statistic = list(
      gtsummary::all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})",
      gtsummary::all_categorical() ~ "{n} / {N} ({p}%)"
    )
  )
```
